resources.string: In certain YouTube versions, this setting can make the system navigation bar transparent or the layout can be broken in PIP mode.

"Action buttons are hidden by identifier filter.
Info: • Right action buttons are hidden. • Hiding action buttons leaves empty space."

"Action buttons are hidden by index.
Info: • Wrong action buttons may be hidden, or action buttons may not be hidden. • Hiding action buttons leaves no empty space."
Expand and close buttons are shown.

"Buttons are hidden.
Swipe to expand or close."
